Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide -- Health Unit Tax 2-1/2 Mill - PJ - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(HEALTH UNIT TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2-1/2 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR THE PURPOSES OF FURNISHING THE PARISH'S PORTION OF FUNDS TO MAINTAIN AND OPERATE THE VERMILION PARISH HEALTH UNITS, AND CONSTRUCTING, ACQUIRING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING A RABIES AND ANIMAL CONTROL PROGRAM AND FACILITIES FOR THE PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of two and one-half (2-1 /2) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $624,460) on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish for a period often (10) years beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purposes of furnishing the Parish's portion of funds to maintain and operate the Vermilion Parish Health Units, and constructing, acquiring, maintaining and operating a rabies and animal control program and facilities for the Parish?

Race.SummaryText:
SUB-ROAD DISTRICT NO. 3 OF ROAD DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION 
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 5 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR MAINTAINING THE ROADS IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Sub-Road District No. 3 of Road District No. 2 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of five (5) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $75,605) on all property subject to taxation in the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining the roads in the District?
